Meanwhile, Sergio Marchionne also said Fiat will not consider selling its Alfa Romeo brand to Volkswagen AG. VW Chairman Ferdinand Piech has indicated an interest in buying Alfa from Fiat Group. But Sergio Marchionne said: As long as I am CEO of Chrysler and Fiat, Mr. Ferdinand Piech will never have Alfa Romeo. It's hands-off. I told him. I will call him and I will e-mail him.
